official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to considering addiction to nicotine to be a disability.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that addiction to nicotine should not be considered a disability for purposes of specified provisions of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 and the Rehabilitation Act of 1973.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to considering addiction to nicotine to be a disability.
